entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Walkerton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.7°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
